title: Mellow Mushroom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of hippie-themed pizza chain. Has veggie pizzas, calzones, hoagies, plus hummus and pita. Options for pizzas and calzones include tofu, tempeh, artichoke hearts, mushrooms, peppers, sundried tomatoes, and more. Vegans need to be specific.
